title: Shared knowledge base for the team
content:
knowledge = Knowledge(
    vector_db=LanceDb(
        uri="tmp/lancedb",
        table_name="agno_docs_team",
        search_type=SearchType.hybrid,
        embedder=CohereEmbedder(id="embed-v4.0"),
        reranker=CohereReranker(model="rerank-v3.5"),
    ),
)
